process_co_pc module¶

class process_co_pc.ProcessCOPC[source]¶

Bases: object

Contains the methods to create columns that appear only in the CO and PC files, and not in the PF.

copc_epostcard(df)[source]¶

Generates a piecewise value based on FISYR and EPOSTCARD. This replaces the existing EPOSTCARD value, which is a datetime object, with a 1 or a 0.

ARGUMENTS df (DataFrame) : Core file dataframe

RETURNS Series

copc_soiyr(df)[source]¶

Slices the month off the end of TAXPER. Returns the month-1 if month is not 12. This is a holdover from the original SQL code. Also catches month=1, so that it never returns a month of 0. Identical to STYEAR.

ARGUMENTS df (DataFrame) : Core file dataframe

RETURNS Series

copc_styear(df)[source]¶

Slices the month off the end of TAXPER. Returns the month-1 if month is not 12. This is a holdover from the original SQL code. Also catches month=1, so that it never returns a month of 0.

ARGUMENTS df (DataFrame) : Core file dataframe

RETURNS Series

copc_subcd(df)[source]¶

Simply returns the value from SUBSECCD. Holdover from the original SQL code.

ARGUMENTS df (DataFrame) : Core file dataframe

RETURNS Series

process_co_pc.co_dup_criteria(dups)[source]¶
process_co_pc.pc_dup_criteria(dups)[source]¶
